org.apache.hadoop.conf
Interface Configurable

All Known Subinterfaces:
Tool
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractMapWritable, AvroReflectSerialization, AvroSerialization, AvroSpecificSerialization, ChecksumFileSystem, Command, Configured, Count, DefaultCodec, EnumSetWritable, FileSystem, FilterFileSystem, FTPFileSystem, GenericWritable, GzipCodec, KosmosFileSystem, LocalFileSystem, MapWritable, MigrationTool, NativeS3FileSystem, ObjectWritable, RawLocalFileSystem, S3FileSystem, ScriptBasedMapping, SocksSocketFactory, SortedMapWritable, Trash, WritableSerialization
@InterfaceAudience.Public
@InterfaceStability.Stable
public interface Configurable

Something that may be configured with a Configuration.

          Return the configuration used by this object.
